# catalystcenter_areas (Data Source)

This data source can read the Areas.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "catalystcenter_areas" "example" {
  id = "76d24097-41c4-4558-a4d0-a8c07ac08470"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The id of the object

### Read-Only

- `areas` (Attributes Set) List of areas (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--areas))

<a id="nestedatt--areas"></a>
### Nested Schema for `areas`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The id of the area
- `name` (String) The name of the area
- `parent_id` (String) The parent ID of the area
- `parent_name_hierarchy` (String) Parent hierarchical name (e.g., Global/USA)
